short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Conversations and GPTs inside ChatGPT, Simple & Safe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly Search Your ChatGPT Conversations and GPTs like MacOS Spotlight! 🚀🔍

Key Features:
- Experience the speed of Mac OS's Spotlight, seamlessly switch between your chats with no mouse needed! 🖱️➡️🚫
- In ChatGPT, hit Cmd+S to bring up the search box. 🧙‍♂️✨
- Quickly locate your conversations or GPTs using keywords, and use arrow keys to navigate and - Enter to jump into a chat. ⌨️🔥
- Effortlessly manage your index without any hassle. 📚🧹
- Fully safe since no server call or tracking, we care your privacy very much 🛡️ 🔒

2023/12/14 Updates: 
- support self define hot key
- more language support
 
2024/08/30 Updates: works on chatgpt.com

The ultimate gift for ChatGPT deep users. Just try it and feel the magic! 🎁💫🤖
